All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FileManager
Handles the reads and writes on the local directory of the application.
MainMenu
This is the main menu, it is displayed on the Launch of the program.
Question
This object represents the questions.
Question.QuestionType
This enum contains tho possible question types that a Question can be.
QuestionAttribute
This Activity is used to display and modify the attributes of a question.
QuestionEvaluationPage
This activity is used to show the correctness of the answer and the explanation of the question.
Questionnaire
This Activity manages the question display, and the answer gathering.
QuestionnaireManager
QuestionnaireManager can be used to hold, evaluate and display the contents of the Question objects into the application.
QuestionSettings
This activity display all the questions to the user and lets them access those questions or to add a new one.
SettingData
This is a data object containing a pair of Strings.
Settings
This activity handles the Settings menu.
SettingsList
A subclass of the ArrayList, used to provide further functionality.
SummaryPage
Display the summary result to the user.
